name: Sweet and Spicy Sweet Potatoes
author: Erin R Pitman
summary: The spicy mixture covering these sweet potatoes is also good on chicken pieces!
ingredients: 2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed
directions: Preheat an oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Place the sweet potato chunks into a large mixing bowl
Drizzle with the olive oil, then sprinkle the brown sugar, paprika, black pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, poultry seasoning, chili powder, and cayenne pepper overtop
Toss until the potatoes are evenly coated with the seasoning
Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes, then turn the potatoes over with a spatula, and continue baking until the sweet potatoes are golden and tender, 10 to 15 minutes more
